dt.t: he felt incapable of looking into the girl's pretty, {wi}healthful{/wi} face

pt: {sc}healthful{/sc} {sc}wholesome{/sc} {sc}salubrious{/sc} {sc}salutary{/sc} mean favorable to the health of mind or body. {sc}healthful{/sc} implies a positive contribution to a healthy condition.
{sc}wholesome{/sc} applies to what benefits, builds up, or sustains physically, mentally, or spiritually.
{sc}salubrious{/sc} applies chiefly to the helpful effects of climate or air.
{sc}salutary{/sc} describes something corrective or beneficially effective, even though it may in itself be unpleasant.

pt.t: a {it}salutary{/it} warning that resulted in increased production

shortdef: beneficial to health of body or mind
